docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, April 12-- Two thousand Argentine troops paraded in the Argentine capital today as ranking officials, led by President Edelmiro Farrell, participated in memorial services for the late President Roosevelt.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, April 12-- Two thousand Argentine troops paraded in the Argentine capital today as ranking officials, led by President Edelmiro Farrell, participated in memorial services for the late President Roosevelt.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 22--Argentine pressure upon Uruguay since Juan D. Peron's election as President has caused a partial crisis here. Two Ministers resigned, it was officially announced today, in an action that is capable of causing a serious...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 22--Argentine pressure upon Uruguay since Juan D. Peron's election as President has caused a partial crisis here. Two Ministers resigned, it was officially announced today, in an action that is capable of causing a serious international situation.
docs.abstract: Peron urges followers to cease using word Peronista because it implies personal pol
